description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Works and Correspondence of Robert Burns, including his letters to Clarinda; remarks on Scottish songs and ballads, illustrated by historical and critical notes, biographical notices [by James Currie], &c. &c. With an extensive glossary of the Scottish language; a life of the author; and an essay on his genius and writings", "Works" Author: Burns, Robert Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11609.i.3." Page: 607 Place of Publishing: Glasgow Date of Publishing: 1866 Publisher: 29. William Mackenzie Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000543193 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
